participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, enjoys meeting new people and embracing challenges.
participant_1.background: I like to wear zebra print to make myself feel younger. I love my work and just got promoted. I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides. I am a tour guide at the Grand Canyon. My dad works in the automotive industry.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Friendly and creative, enjoys learning and has a passion for baking and health.
participant_2.background: I enjoy reading about health issues to learn more about my body and how to take care of it. I love eating at McDonald's. I live with my best friend. In my free time, I like to bake cupcakes and watch wrestling. I recently proposed to my girlfriend of three years.

content.text: Hi, I'm a tour guide at the Grand Canyon and I just got promoted!
Congrats! That's awesome! I love the Grand Canyon, I've been there a few times!
Thanks, it's a great job. I get to see some amazing views every day.
What's your favorite part about the job?
I love getting to meet all the different people from all over the world.
That sounds really cool! I love meeting new people too.
Yeah, it's one of the best parts of the job.
What's the craziest thing that's ever happened while you were working?
Well, I've had to rescue a few people who got caught in riptides.
Wow, that's scary! I'm glad you were able to help them.
Me too. It's definitely one of the most stressful parts of the job, but it's also really rewarding.
I can imagine. It's always nice to be able to help someone in need.
Yeah, it is. It's one of the things that makes this job so great.
What other things do you like to do in your free time?
I like to read about health issues and bake cupcakes.
That's cool! I love to bake too. What's your favorite cupcake recipe?
I like to make red velvet cupcakes with cream cheese frosting.
Yum! I love red velvet cupcakes.
Me too! They're so good.
I'm going to have to try making those sometime.
You should! They're really easy to make.
Thanks for the tip!
No problem
